thought: I should first check the website's content to see if it has any characteristics of a scam website.
observation: CryptoTaxAudit | Home  This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Learn more Got it! Tax Services Tax Return Preparation Tax Services Pricing Tax Deadlines Do My Own Taxes Tax Help Center Tax Glossary Crypto Services Crypto Gain Calculations Crypto Services Pricing Crypto Tax Review IRS Resolution IRS Guard Dog Pricing IRS Monitoring Report IRS Notices Help with Audit About About Us Blog Contact Sign In Expertise in Cryptos, Taxes, Audits, and IRS Representation Our team of CPAs, Enrolled Agents, Forensic Accountants, and Crypto Analysts excels in addressing the most challenging issues related to crypto taxes. We collaborate with owners of digital assets to safeguard their rights and reduce their crypto tax liabilities within the confines of the law. > I need help with Crypto Calculations Help, I got a scary letter from the IRS Talk to an Expert Talk to Our Team of Experts As Seen On: Tax Preparation Services If you have digital asset income The Bulletproof Return proactive money-saving tax method We expertly cut through the complexities of the tax system for you to minimize your tax bill, keep more income, and reduce your chances of being audited. Request A Quote Book a call with an Expert Expert Crypto Gain Calculation Services Pulling your hair out calculating your crypto income? Read More IRS Guard Dog and Resolution Services Have issues with the IRS? Our team of Enrolled Agents and CPAs is ready to help you. Let us think about the IRS so you don’t have to. Activate IRS Guard Dog Talk to Enrolled Agent cash cow business that needs a cutting-edge approach to tax deductions Schedule a Consultation Need help figuring out your crypto taxable income? Whether you need us to do all the work, or just a review of your own crypto tax reports, our crypto accountants are here to help. How we've helped people like you Hidden Refunds Audit Alert IRS Guard Dog alerted Chris in California of a pre-audit flag that appeared on his IRS account. We consulted with Chris and implemented a plan that addressed the issues and avoided the audit! Debt Resolution Michael, an investor from Ohio, owed significant taxes on his gains. We worked with the IRS and structured a payment plan to pay off his balance due over 7 years. This allowed him to maintain his investments and improve his monthly cash flow. Why is CryptoTaxAudit a trusted partner by the largest digital asset investors in the U.S.? We provide accurate, full-service crypto gain calculation at a fixed price, We prepare a sophisticated tax return that protects you We defend investors in IRS audits of their digital asset income through audit, appeals, and to Tax Court. We value your privacy CryptoTaxAudit is committed to protecting your data and privacy.  Our business policies include mandating secure practices and utilizing vetted tools while handling and storing personal or financial data.  We conform to various international standards, including GLBA, GDPR, IRS financial security guidelines, and other regulations and laws.  We list our most current security guidance in our Privacy Policy and are always willing to provide more details when requested. © 2024 CryptoTaxAudit

thought: The website does not mention anything about unusually low prices or claims of free. It also does not claim to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. However, the website does target human psychological weaknesses by using phrases such as "The Bulletproof Return proactive money-saving tax method" and "We expertly cut through the complexities of the tax system for you to minimize your tax bill, keep more income, and reduce your chances of being audited." Additionally, the website does not provide any information on the company behind it, and the inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. The privacy policy is also ambiguous, and the payment methods are not common. Finally, the information listed on the website has not been updated since 2024.
observation: Navigating to https://www.cryptotaxaudit.com/ returned status code 200

thought: The website was registered in 2017 and is set to expire in 2024. The registrant information is protected by a privacy service, which is a common tactic used by scammers to hide their identities. The website's name servers are hosted by Cloudflare, which is a popular service used by legitimate websites as well as scammers.
